docs.lead_paragraph: I ALMOST claimed exemption," said Corporal Benjamin F. Chapman, headquarters company, 308th Infantry, national army, at Camp Upton. "It seemed at first as if I ought to, and then I figured it out that my wife could get along, and so I didn't ask to be exempt. And I'm thankful from the bottom of my heart. Camp Upton has made me strong again."

headline.main: HOW CAMP LIFE MAKES MEN OVER; Benefits of Military Training Evidenced in the Strength and Steady Nerves Acquired by Civilians Drafted for the National Army at Camp Upton How Camp Life Makes Men Over
